pass.name: Drag
pass.description: Shallow crossing route, ~5 yards across the field. High-percentage throw.
tips: Look for soft spots in coverage

pass.name: Corner
pass.description: Deep outside break toward the corner of the end zone. 15-20 yards.
tips: Attacks the hole between corner and safety
Timing route - throw before the break

pass.name: Seam
pass.description: Vertical route up the middle, between hash marks.
tips: Attack the middle of the field
Read the safety - throw if he commits

pass.name: Slant
pass.description: Quick inside break at 45 degrees, 3-5 yards.

pass.name: Post
pass.description: Deep route breaking toward the goalpost, 12-15 yards.

pass.name: Out
pass.description: Sharp 90-degree break toward the sideline, 10-12 yards.

pass.name: Fade
pass.description: Straight vertical along the sideline. Red zone specialty.

pass.name: Flat
pass.description: Quick route to the flat area near the sideline.

pass.name: Screen
pass.description: Receiver or RB catches behind the line with blockers ahead.

pass.name: Check Down
pass.description: Short dump-off to RB or nearby receiver. Last resort.

pass.name: Dig
pass.description: In-breaking route at 12-15 yards. Sharp 90-degree cut.

pass.name: Curl
pass.description: Stop and turn back toward the QB at 10-12 yards.

run.name: Inside Zone
run.description: Zone blocking scheme between the tackles. RB reads blocks and finds cutback.

run.name: Outside Zone
run.description: Stretch play toward the edge with cutback option.

run.name: Power Run
run.description: Pulling guard leads through the hole. Downhill running.

run.name: Counter
run.description: Misdirection - backfield action one way, linemen pull the other.

run.name: Draw Play
run.description: Fake pass, delayed handoff. Uses pass rush against itself.

run.name: QB Power
run.description: QB keeps and runs with lead blockers. Read option or designed.
